listitem.para: How many of the available X.509 intermediate CA certificates to send with the End certificate (root CA's are never sent). Specifying none sends no intermediate certificates, issuer sends the End certificate's issuing intermediate CA, and all sends all intermediate CAs (the default).

Prior to &Libreswan; version 5.3, the default was none (that is, no intermediate CAs were sent). &Libreswan; never sends intermediate certificates when establishing a connection using IKEv1's Agressive Mode.
